Path to NONMEM control file

Source: R/nm_gettersetters.R
ctl_path.Rd

Get and set path to control file.

ctl_path(m, text)

Arguments

m

nm object
text

optional character. Name of path to control file (see details). Typically, this file does not yet normally exist, but will house the code code for this run

Details

"text" can contain "run_id" string. E.g. "Models/runrun_id.mod" will use the name "Models/runm1.mod" if run_id(m1) is "m1".

Examples

ctl_path,Path to NONMEM control file,Path to NONMEM control file — ctl_path,Source: R/nm_gettersetters.R,ctl_path.Rd,character(0),ctl_path,character(0),list(title = "Description", contents = "
Get and set path to control file.

nm object
"), list(name = "text", description = "
optional character. Name of path to control file (see details).\nTypically, this file does not yet normally exist, but will house the code\ncode for this run
")),TRUE,
if (FALSE) {

m0 <- nm(run_id = "m0")
ctl_name(m0)

m0 <- m0 %>% ctl_name("run{run_id}.mod")
ctl_name(m0)
## warning: this makes the run identifier in old xpose4 "_m0" not "m0"! ## deleteme

m0 <- m0 %>% ctl_path("Models/run_{run_id}.mod")
ctl_path(m0)


}
